desc: mProjExec loops over a list of images, reprojecting each of them using mProject, mProjectPP or mProjectQL.

arguments.name: tblfile
arguments.desc: Table file list of raw images .

arguments.name: template
arguments.desc: FITS header file used to define the desired output.

arguments.name: projdir
arguments.desc: Path to output projected image directory.

arguments.name: quickMode
arguments.desc: Flag to force use of mProjectQL function.

arguments.name: exact
arguments.desc: Flag to force use of mProject over mProjectPP function.  No-op if quickMode is used.

arguments.name: wholeImages
arguments.desc: Flag to force reprojection of all of each image, even outside template region.

arguments.name: energyMode
arguments.desc: Pixel values are total energy rather than energy density.

arguments.name: border
arguments.desc: Optional string that contains either a border width or comma-separated 'x1,y1,x2,y2, ...' pairs defining a pixel region polygon where we keep only the data inside.

arguments.name: scaleCol
arguments.desc: Table file can have columns defining scale.

arguments.name: weightCol
arguments.desc: and weighting values to be applied to data and 'area' output files.

arguments.name: restart
arguments.desc: Bulk reprojection sometimes needs to be restarted part way through the list. This is the record in the table to start with.

arguments.name: stats
arguments.desc: The programs keeps statistics on each reprojection in this file.

return.name: nooverlap
return.desc: Number of images not overlapping the region of interest.
